entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -7.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
